Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/Diversey
ShortDescription: 53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, Diversey, Central Park, Fullerton, and Pulaski near Pulaski/Diversey.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, Diversey, Central Park, Fullerton, and Pulaski near Pulaski/Diversey.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier track switching problems near 35th-Bronzeville-IIT. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier track switching problems near 35th-Bronzeville-IIT.

Trains are moving.  Please allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line  Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Harlem (FP). Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Harlem (Forest Park Branch).

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
